The Blog





Welcome!

By Amit Kulkarni

Posted on December 12, 2020

Welcome to my blog! Now, you may be wondering why I'm developing my own blog instead of using other services like blogger, wordpress, etc.. And the short tl;dr reason is because I want to try something new.

However, there are a few other benefits of just writing my own blog. Here are a list of reasons of why I'm doing so:

  1. There's no limit to the number of words I want to write
  2. No ads
  3. I can directly put it on my home page without embedding it from another website
  4. I can add more formatting or add exteral scripts for fancy animations
  5. So that I can practice coding
  6. 'Cause it's cooler, you know?

For now, I will be updating this blog in basic HTML and CSS. However, I will eventually implement PHP so that I can create dynamic pages and edit my blogs directly on the website instead of hardcoding it. I also know that I need to make the website more mobile-friendly and I will do so as I get time.

As you can tell, this project is going to take a while to develop but I will make some update every now and then.

Thanks for reading!
